programme.title: Heathrow: Britains Busiest Airport

programme.desc: David Dickinson and his team are in Stoke-on-Trent as sellers look to cash in a family collection of 500 vinyl records and a painting that has been in the loft for 40 years.

programme.desc: A team of colleagues from the British Transport Police attempt to top the Tenable Tower to win a big cash prize. Hosted by Warwick Davis.
